=== Test 2 ===
* Contact: MicheleFalappi
* Make: Acer
* Brand: Aspire
* Model: 6530G

Installation using Live Cd Amd64. No problems during installation.

=== Current Issues ===
The internal mic is not working
The headphone jack is not properly working. It is needed to fix the volume using Volume Preferences.

The "windows key + E" open all work space.
